TableDefinition.Name: Exposure response function subgroups
TableDefinition.Description: Exposure response functions defined per exposure category.

ColumnDefinition.Description: The unique identifier of the exposure response model.
The unique identifier of the subgroup.

Specifies the upper bound of the exposure percentile of the exposure response function subgroup. Exposure belong to a subgroup when the exposure is equal or lower than the specified upper bound and larger than the specified upper bound of the previous subgroup.

ColumnDefinition.Name: ExposureResponseSpecification
ColumnDefinition.Description: The specification for the exposure response. Either a mathematical expression when the exposure response type is function, or a single value if the exposure response type is constant, perDoubling, or perUnit.

ColumnDefinition.Name: ExposureResponseSpecificationLower
ColumnDefinition.Description: Exposure response lower uncertainty bound. Either a mathematical expression when the exposure response type is function, or a single value if the exposure response type is constant, perDoubling, or perUnit.

ColumnDefinition.Name: ExposureResponseSpecificationUpper
ColumnDefinition.Description: Exposure response upper uncertainty bound. Either a mathematical expression when the exposure response type is function, or a single value if the exposure response type is constant, perDoubling, or perUnit.
